CreateCloudRecording.document:
This example shows you how to start on-cloud recording in room 3560 under the application whose `SDKAppID` is `1234`.

The timeout period for recording is one minute.
The recording mode is mixed-stream recording.
The type of the streams recorded are audio and video.
The streams of all anchors in the room are subscribed.
The resolution of the recorded video is 360 x 640, the frame rate is 15 fps, and the bitrate is 500,000 bps. The default background color is used.
The grid layout template is used.
The recording file is saved to Tencent Cloud VOD.
CreateCloudRecording.title: Starting an on-cloud recording task

DeleteCloudRecording.document: This example shows you how to stop the on-cloud recording task whose ID is xx under the application whose `SDKAppID` is `1234`.
DeleteCloudRecording.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: trtc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteCloudRecording
<Common request parameters>

{
    "TaskId": "xx",
    "SdkAppId": 1234
}
DeleteCloudRecording.title: Stopping an on-cloud recording task

DescribeCloudRecording.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: trtc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCloudRecording
<Common request parameters>

{
    "TaskId": "xx",
    "SdkAppId": 1234
}
DescribeCloudRecording.title: Querying the status of the task whose task ID is xx under the application whose `SDKAppID` is `1234`

DismissRoom.document: This example shows you how to close room `1234`.
DismissRoom.title: Closing a room

DismissRoomByStrRoomId.document: This example shows you how to close room `abcd`.
DismissRoomByStrRoomId.title: Closing a room

ModifyCloudRecording.document: This example shows you how to subscribe to the video and audio streams of user 123 and 456 and customize the layout for the recording task whose task ID is xx under the application whose `SDKAppID` is `1234`.
ModifyCloudRecording.title: Modifying an on-cloud recording task

RemoveUser.document: This example shows you how to remove users `test1` and `test2` from room `1234`.
RemoveUser.title: Removing users from a room

RemoveUserByStrRoomId.document: This example shows you how to remove users `test1` and `test2` from room `abcd`.
RemoveUserByStrRoomId.title: Removing users from a room

SetUserBlocked.title: Disabling the audio and video of a user

SetUserBlockedByStrRoomId.title: Disabling the audio and video of a user (string-type room ID)

StartPublishCdnStream.title: Starting a task to mix streams and relay the mixed stream
Starting a task to relay the audio and video of a stream
Starting a task to relay only the audio of a stream
Starting a task to relay the audios and videos in a room and pass through the SEI messages. The audios are mixed before relaying.
Starting a task to mix the audios of all users in a room and the video of one user and relay the result

StopPublishCdnStream.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: trtc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: StopPublishCdnStream
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400188366,
    "TaskId": "-m97l2ZU7kOlV5cTRMoU6yoGp2nDYkzbJ13EC4K-4pycoZXVv+XVrNoUXQ8++8Z2PwUlAQ.."
}
StopPublishCdnStream.title: Stopping a relaying task

UpdatePublishCdnStream.document: This example shows you how to change a relaying task to mix the audio and video of `Trtc_User_0` and `Trtc_User_3`.
UpdatePublishCdnStream.title: Changing the audios mixed and the video layout

UpdatePublishCdnStream.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: trtc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdatePublishCdnStream
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400188366,
    "TaskId": "-m97l2ZU7kOlV5cTRMoU6yoGp2nDYkzbJ13EC4K-4pycoZXVv+XVrNoUXQ8++8Z2PwUlAQ..",
    "SequenceNumber": 20,
    "WithTranscoding": 1,
    "PublishCdnParams": [
        {
            "IsTencentCdn": 1,
            "PublishCdnUrl": "rtmp://3891.livepush.myqcloud.com/live/trtc_publishcdn_test2?bizid=3891&txSecret=23aeb6ec16fd275af0d00a447b2282f7&txTime=62635BDE"
        }
    ]
}
UpdatePublishCdnStream.title: Changing the relaying parameters
